title: When Light Fades: A Collection of the Darkest Short Stories and Poetry
description: Dive into Darkness with a collection of dark, paranormal poetry and short stories with a twist of horror to play on your inner fears. When Light Fades is a collection of writing that will have you thinking twice about that tapping outside your window, or that scorned lover you broke down one too many times. These writings are filled with revenge, disaster at it's best and a twist of sick madness to have you chewing at your nails as soon as you read the pages. Be prepared to enter the world of the wicked, where insane rule and sanity has been lost forever.
author: Tabetha Jones
